Module jakarta.servlet
Package jakarta.servlet

Interface ServletResponse

All Known Subinterfaces:
HttpServletResponse, WebApplicationResponse
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultWebApplicationResponse, EmbeddedResponse, HttpServletResponseWrapper, HttpWebApplicationResponse, NanoResponse, ServletResponseWrapper
public interface ServletResponse
The ServletResponse API.
Author:
Manfred Riem (mriem@manorrock.com)
